message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start.
I think 55/45 is more than fair, considering the inflation
Bob, time is running out for both of us. I'm willing to come down a bit, but this is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I think you can do better, especially with inflation eating away at your share
Bob, let's be realistic. The clock is ticking and inflation is hurting me more than you. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
You're right, time is running out, but I think I can afford to wait a bit longer. This is my new offer
